title: LF Gold-plat Jungler for a Team.
body: Creating a New team and need a jungler. The Teams just starting to form up but hopes to compete in smaller scale tourneys. Message me here or Add me on League Client (Horizonn)  if Interested. We've got a coach/manager to help with issues in game.

replies.body:
I am a **Platinum 2** Jungle Main; Mid secondary.
[](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=F1ddlesticks)
I am highly available on when it comes to playing LoL.
My Champion Pool is: Fiddlesticks, Shaco and Kha'zix Jungle. Fizz and zed mid.
Please add me if you are interested in having me.
I'd be happy to join ðŸ˜Š
Sweet as man! Add me on client and we can chat a bit more :D
